snippet.title: Axyn Adventure Trailer
snippet.description:
Heald, the prince of Centralis went missing. Axyn was sent to Arkaika to look for him. There, he stumbled upon the ruins of a mysterious ancient temple. Will Axyn discover the secrets of the ancient civilization and will he find the prince?

Axyn Adventure is a retro style 3D platformer. You take control of the titular character Axyn and embarks on many adventures with your friends Yunn and Leaf. Play in the vast open levels using you big set of moves to get around. Collect as many items as you can to advance the story and unlock tons of content.

Play the demo now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3372620/Axyn_Adventure/

Itch: https://shinlalala.itch.io/axyn
